projects.title: Language Translator
projects.description: This project was an exploration of javascript functions. We played around with arrays, for loops, and conditional statements to build a bad translator app for a holiday card.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Whaddup
projects.description: A group project focused on the concepts of JSON, where we created a Windows 95-themed chat application in single page format.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap 4, AJAX, Version Control with Github

projects.title: WYSIWYG
projects.alt: What You See Is What You Get Screenshot
projects.description: A bonus exercise that makes use of event listeners, tests our understanding of order of importance in javascript, and challenges our ability to 'traverse the dom'.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
